select * from (select pa.postid as postid, pa.userid, pa.caption, pa.cateid, pa.url, pa.location, a_regdate, p_regdate, isLike, isStore from
(select p.id as POSTID, p.USERID, p.CAPTION, p.CATEID, group_concat(a.url separator '|') as url, p.location, a.REGDATE as a_regdate, p.regdate as p_regdate from tbl_post p left join tbl_attach a on p.id = a.POSTID group by p.id) as pa join (select pl.postid, isLike, isStore from (select distinct(p.id) as postid, l.userid as isLike from tbl_post p left join tbl_post_like l on p.id = l.POSTID and l.userid = #{userid}) pl join (select p.id as postid, s.userid as isStore from tbl_post p left join tbl_store s on p.id = s.POSTID and s.userid = #{userid}) ps on pl.postid=ps.postid) as pls on pa.postid = pls.postid) plsa
join (select u.MNO, u.NAME as USERNAME, u.PROFILEPHOTO from tbl_follow f join tbl_user u on f.FOLLOWEDID = u.MNO and f.userid = #{userid} or u.MNO = #{userid} group by u.MNO) as uf on plsa.USERID = uf.MNO order by p_regdate DESC, a_regdate DESC
